attributes.action: Dismiss from office any MP who votes against the issue of Article 50.
attributes.additional_details: Reports suggest Tim Fallon of the Liberal Democratic Party along with some members of the Labour Party are plotting to vote against the issue of Article 50 using an incorrect and misconceived argument that the British people who voted 'Leave' in the EU Referendum did not know that leave meant leaving the Single Market. This is a betrayal of the British people's democratic majority decision. The video link I attached proves leaving the Single Market was voiced loud and clear during the campaign.
attributes.background: To vote against the issue of Article 50 on the basis Britain did not know that a leave vote meant leaving the Single Market is conducting an act of theft against Britain's democratic majority decision. https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=1323676831016671&id=363704527013911

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
